name: MXAppExitMetric
desc: An object representing metrics about the types of foreground and background app exits.

items.name: var foregroundExitData: MXForegroundExitData
items.desc: The metrics for the foreground app exits.

items.name: class MXForegroundExitData
items.desc: An object representing counts for the different types of foreground app exits.

items.name: var backgroundExitData: MXBackgroundExitData
items.desc: The metrics for the background app exits.

items.name: class MXBackgroundExitData
items.desc: An object representing counts for the different types of background app exits.
